Package pl.project.stages

Class Auction

java.lang.Object
pl.project.stages.Auction
All Implemented Interfaces:
Stage
public class Auction extends Object implements Stage
The Auction class represents the auction stage in a game where players can bet, fold, or take other betting actions.

This class handles the client's interaction during the auction stage, including receiving server responses, processing player actions, and sending appropriate requests to the server.

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute(Client client)
      Executes the auction stage for the given client.

      This method continuously processes server responses and handles client actions based on the current state of the auction.

      Specified by:
      execute in interface Stage
      Parameters:
      client - the Client object representing the player in the auction stage

      Handles the server's response during the auction stage.

      response - the server's response as a string
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      parts - the response tokens containing auction details (e.g., cash, stake, minimum bet)
